hero.title: Get Started
hero.subtitle1: The Foret Design System is served both React and Angular.
hero.subtitle2: Head over to Frameworks for all the information you need to get started.

installation.installEmotionCore: Don’t forget to install the @emotion/core ^10.0.0 also.

contributing.title: Contributing
contributing.description1: We want to provide only components of the highest quality. We can’t do that without your feedback. If you have any suggestions or any issues about what we can do to improve components, please create an issue or submit a pull request at

designPrinciple.principle2Description: Not only should it look comfortable in appearance, it should also feel comfortable in usability.
designPrinciple.principle3Description: It must not splash. The role of each design element should be taken for granted and naturally.

button.title: Button
button.description: A button is an interactive element that results in an action described on it

button.disabled: If set to true, the button would be disabled.

toggle.title: Toggle
toggle.description: A toggle is used to quickly switch between two possible states. They are commonly used for “on/off” switches.

toggle.id: The id of toggle. It's used to identifies the toggle.
toggle.disabled: If set to true, the toggle would be disabled.
toggle.checked: If set to true, the toggle would be checked.
toggle.onToggle: Callback function to invoke when the user clicks on the toggle.
